    publications

    Track-To-Learn: A general framework for tractography with deep reinforcement learning

    Published in bioRxiv, 2020

    Use Google Scholar for full citation

    Recommended citation: Antoine Th{\'e}berge, Christian Desrosiers, Maxime Descoteaux, Pierre-Marc Jodoin, "Track-To-Learn: A general framework for tractography with deep reinforcement learning." bioRxiv, 2020.

    Manifold-aware Synthesis of High-resolution Diffusion from Structural Imaging

    Published in arXiv preprint arXiv:2108.04135, 2021

    Use Google Scholar for full citation

    Recommended citation: Benoit Anctil-Robitaille, Antoine Th{\'e}berge, Pierre-Marc Jodoin, Maxime Descoteaux, Christian Desrosiers, Herv{\'e} Lombaert, "Manifold-aware Synthesis of High-resolution Diffusion from Structural Imaging." arXiv preprint arXiv:2108.04135, 2021.

    Track-to-Learn: A general framework for tractography with deep reinforcement learning

    Published in Medical Image Analysis, 2021

    Use Google Scholar for full citation

    Recommended citation: Antoine Th{\'e}berge, Christian Desrosiers, Maxime Descoteaux, Pierre-Marc Jodoin, "Track-to-Learn: A general framework for tractography with deep reinforcement learning." Medical Image Analysis, 2021.

    Where do streamlines come from? Seeding strategies impact on streamline distribution

    Published in In the proceedings of International Society for Magnetic Resonance Imaging in Medicine, 2021

    Use Google Scholar for full citation

    Recommended citation: Manon Edde, Etienne St-Onge, Antoine Th{\'e}berge, Guillaume Theaud, Emmanuelle Renauld, Maxime Descoteaux, "Where do streamlines come from? Seeding strategies impact on streamline distribution." In the proceedings of International Society for Magnetic Resonance Imaging in Medicine, 2021.

    The do's and don'ts of reinforcement learning for tractography

    Published in In the proceedings of Medical Imaging with Deep Learning, 2022

    Use Google Scholar for full citation

    Recommended citation: Antoine Theberge, Christian Desrosiers, Pierre-marc Jodoin, Maxime Descoteaux, "The do&apos;s and don&apos;ts of reinforcement learning for tractography." In the proceedings of Medical Imaging with Deep Learning, 2022.

    Tractostorm 2: Optimizing tractography dissection reproducibility with segmentation protocol dissemination

    Published in Human brain mapping, 2022

    Use Google Scholar for full citation

    Recommended citation: Francois Rheault, Kurt Schilling, Alex Valcourt-Caron, Antoine Th{\'e}berge, Charles Poirier, Gabrielle Grenier, Guido Guberman, John Begnoche, Jon Legarreta, Leon Y, "Tractostorm 2: Optimizing tractography dissection reproducibility with segmentation protocol dissemination." Human brain mapping, 2022.
